mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as cart_rnum, result1.* FROM (SELECT b.product_imagePath, b.product_name, b.product_price, b.product_point, a.cart_count, a.cart_id, a.users_id FROM cart a LEFT OUTER JOIN product b ON a.product_id = b.product_id WHERE users_id= #{users_id} ORDER BY cart_id ASC) result1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_id, users_id, product_id) VALUES(cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{users_id} , #{product_id})
